00041 #ifndef _CONFIG_H_
00042 #define _CONFIG_H_
00043 
00044 // Compiler switch (do not change these settings)
00045 #include "lib_mcu/compiler.h"             // Compiler definitions
00046 #ifdef __GNUC__
00047    #include <avr/io.h>                    // Use AVR-GCC library
00048 #elif __ICCAVR__
00049    #define ENABLE_BIT_DEFINITIONS
00050    #include <ioavr.h>                     // Use IAR-AVR library
00051 #else
00052    #error Current COMPILER not supported
00053 #endif
00054 
00055 
00056 //! @defgroup global_config Application configuration
00057 //! @{
00058 
00059 #include "conf/conf_scheduler.h" //!< Scheduler tasks declaration
00060 
00061 //! To include proper target hardware definitions, select
00062 //! target board (USBKEY, STK525, STK600)
00063 #define TARGET_BOARD USBKEY
00064 
00065 //! CPU core frequency in kHz
00066 #define FOSC 8000
00067 
00068    //! \name ADC Configuration
00069    //! This is used as input for tounge sensors
00070    //! @{
00071 #define  USE_ADC                     //!< Enable or not the ADC usage
00072 #define  ADC_PRESCALER              64 //!< ADC Prescaler value
00073 #define  ADC_RIGHT_ADJUST_RESULT    0  //!< Left adjust
00074 #define  ADC_INTERNAL_VREF          1  //!< Use ADC internal Vref
00075 #define  ADC_IT                     0  //!< Disable ADC interrupt
00076 #define  ADC_DIGITAL_OFF            1  //!< Turns off digital use of Port F (ADCs)
00077    //! @}
00078 
00079 
00080    //! \name Mouse Configuration
00081    //! Defines used in mouse_task.c
00082    //! @{
00083 #define NB_IDLE_POLLING_SOF         3      //!< 10ms before looking for new mouse hardware event
00084 #define MOUSE_SPEED                 1
00085 #define DEBUG                       0       //!< Set debug or normal mode
00086    //! @}
00087 
00088 
00089 //! @}
00090 
00091 
00092 // Board defines (do not change these settings)
00093 #define  STK525   1
00094 #define  USBKEY   2
00095 #define  STK600   3
00096 #if (TARGET_BOARD==USBKEY)
00097    #include "lib_board\usb_key\usb_key.h"
00098 #elif (TARGET_BOARD==STK525)
00099    #include "lib_board\stk_525\stk_525.h"
00100 #elif (TARGET_BOARD==STK600)
00101    #include "lib_board\stk_600\stk_600.h"
00102 #else
00103    #error TARGET_BOARD must be defined somewhere
00104 #endif
00105 
00106 
00107 #endif // _CONFIG_H_
